verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w lived|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w remote|strong="H3411"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ephraim \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w himself|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w her|strong="H5921"\w* husband \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w kindly|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, taking \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pair|strong="H6776"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*. \w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* father \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w gladly|strong="H8055"\w* \w welcomed|strong="H8055"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w His|strong="H2388"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w*’s father, \w persuaded|strong="H2388"\w* \w him|strong="H2388"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w*, \w so|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H2388"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, eating, \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w lodging|strong="H3885"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

Then \w the|strong="H3885"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w*’s father said \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* \w man|strong="H3820"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* agree \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w overnight|strong="H3885"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w your|strong="H3190"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w merry|strong="H3190"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w depart|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w*’s father, said \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* drawing \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w close|strong="H3824"\w*. \w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w*. \w See|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w almost|strong="H3117"\w* \w over|strong="H1980"\w*. \w Spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3190"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w merry|strong="H3190"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w can|strong="H1980"\w* \w get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3190"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w home|strong="H3212"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* man \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w unwilling|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* arrived \w opposite|strong="H5227"\w* \w Jebus|strong="H2982"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*), \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w two|strong="H6776"\w* \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* \w Jebus|strong="H2982"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w almost|strong="H3966"\w* \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* master, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w stop|strong="H5493"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w* \w here|strong="H2063"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* master replied, “\w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1121"\w*, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H2008"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*. \w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*.”

\w He|strong="H7126"\w* continued, “\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w let|strong="H3212"\w* us try \w to|strong="H3212"\w* reach one \w of|strong="H4725"\w* these \w towns|strong="H3885"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* or \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5674"\w* \w they|strong="H5674"\w* \w continued|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w their|strong="H1144"\w* journey, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* set as \w they|strong="H5674"\w* neared \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3212"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* traveler \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w square|strong="H7339"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H2205"\w* asked, “Where \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w going|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* where \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H5869"\w*?”

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* Levite replied, “\w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w traveling|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w remote|strong="H3411"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Ephraim, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w*. \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w now|strong="H3212"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*;\f + \fr 19:18 \ft LXX I am going to my home; see verse 29.\f* \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H1980"\w* \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H5674"\w* \w me|strong="H5674"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w though|strong="H1571"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w feed|strong="H4554"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* maidservant \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*. \w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w lack|strong="H4270"\w*.”

“\w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H2205"\w*. “Let \w me|strong="H5921"\w* supply \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w need|strong="H4270"\w*. \w Only|strong="H7535"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* not \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w square|strong="H7339"\w*.”

So \w he|strong="H1004"\w* brought him \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7364"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* fed \w his|strong="H7364"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*. \w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H7272"\w* \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w their|strong="H7364"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* ate \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w*.
